languages.text: {n}Здоровяк возле Винтерскейла прищуривает кровавые глаза, его рот растягивается в щербатой улыбке, исполненной предвкушения. Но она умирает, стоит Каллигосу осадить своего слугу небрежным хозяйским жестом.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Здоровяк возле Винтерскейла прищуривает кровавые глаза, его рот растягивается в щербатой улыбке, исполненной предвкушения. Но она умирает, стоит Каллигосу осадить своего слугу небрежным хозяйским жестом.{/n}

languages.text: {n}The brute next to Winterscale narrows his bloodshot eyes, his mouth stretching into a gap-toothed grin that is brimming with eagerness. But the grin fades as soon as Calligos, casually and imperiously, gestures for his servant to settle down.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Здоровяк возле Винтерскейла прищуривает кровавые глаза, его рот растягивается в щербатой улыбке, исполненной предвкушения. Но она умирает, стоит Каллигосу осадить своего слугу небрежным хозяйским жестом.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}The brute next to Calligos narrows his bloodshot eyes, his mouth stretching into a gap-toothed grin that is brimming with eagerness. But the grin dies down as soon as Calligos, casually and imperiously, gestures for his servant to settle down.{/n}

{n}The brute next to Calligos narrows his bloodshot eyes, his mouth stretching into a gap-toothed grin that is brimming with eagerness. But the grin dies down as soon as Calligos, casually and imperiously, gestures for his servant to settle down.{/n}

{n}The brute next to Winterscale narrows his bloodshot eyes, his mouth stretching into a gap-toothed grin that is brimming with eagerness. But the grin fades as soon as Calligos, casually and imperiously, gestures for his servant to settle down.{/n}

{n}The brute next to Winterscale narrows his bloodshot eyes, his mouth stretching into a gap-toothed grin that is brimming with eagerness. But the grin fades as soon as Calligos, casually and imperiously, gestures for his servant to settle down.{/n}

{n}The brute next to Winterscale narrows his bloodshot eyes, his mouth stretching into a gap-toothed grin that is brimming with eagerness. But the grin fades as soon as Calligos, casually and imperiously, gestures for his servant to settle down.{/n}

languages.text: {n}ウィンタースケールの隣にいる獣が充血した目を細めて口を左右に伸ばし、すきっ歯の笑みを満面に浮かべる。やる気満々といった表情だ。しかし、カリゴスが普段どおりの横柄さで、落ち着くよう従者に合図すると、たちまち獣から笑顔が消えた。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The brute next to Winterscale narrows his bloodshot eyes, his mouth stretching into a gap-toothed grin that is brimming with eagerness. But the grin fades as soon as Calligos, casually and imperiously, gestures for his servant to settle down.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}ウィンタースケールの隣にいる獣が充血した目を細めて口を左右に伸ばし、すきっ歯の笑みを満面に浮かべる。やる気満々といった表情だ。しかし、カリゴスが普段どおりの横柄さで、落ち着くよう従者に合図すると、たちまち獣から笑顔が消えた。{/n}

languages.text: {n}温特斯凯尔身旁的壮汉眯起了血红的眼睛，咧开大嘴，露出了嗜血的表情。然而，卡里戈斯只是漫不经心地挥了挥手，那位仆人就收敛起了满脸怒容，安静下来。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The brute next to Winterscale narrows his bloodshot eyes, his mouth stretching into a gap-toothed grin that is brimming with eagerness. But the grin fades as soon as Calligos, casually and imperiously, gestures for his servant to settle down.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}温特斯凯尔身旁的壮汉眯起了血红的眼睛，咧开大嘴，露出了嗜血的表情。然而，卡里戈斯只是漫不经心地挥了挥手，那位仆人就收敛起了满脸怒容，安静下来。{/n}

languages.text: {n}El bruto que hay junto a Winterscale entrecierra sus ojos sanguinarios y su boca esboza una sonrisa llena de anticipación. Sin embargo, la sonrisa se esfuma en cuanto Calligos le ordena con un gesto que se calme.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The brute next to Winterscale narrows his bloodshot eyes, his mouth stretching into a gap-toothed grin that is brimming with eagerness. But the grin fades as soon as Calligos, casually and imperiously, gestures for his servant to settle down.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}El bruto que hay junto a Winterscale entrecierra sus ojos sanguinarios y su boca esboza una sonrisa llena de anticipación. Sin embargo, la sonrisa se esfuma en cuanto Calligos le ordena con un gesto que se calme.{/n}

languages.text: {n}La brute aux côtés de Winterscale plisse ses yeux injectés de sang tout en esquissant un sourire carnassier qui disparaît à l'instant où Calligos, d'un geste à la fois désinvolte et impérieux, lui fait signe de se calmer.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The brute next to Winterscale narrows his bloodshot eyes, his mouth stretching into a gap-toothed grin that is brimming with eagerness. But the grin fades as soon as Calligos, casually and imperiously, gestures for his servant to settle down.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}La brute aux côtés de Winterscale plisse ses yeux injectés de sang tout en esquissant un sourire carnassier qui disparaît à l'instant où Calligos, d'un geste à la fois désinvolte et impérieux, lui fait signe de se calmer.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Der Koloss neben Winterzunder kneift seine blutunterlaufenen Augen zusammen, und sein Mund öffnet sich zu einem Grinsen voller Zahnlücken und Vorfreude. Aber es verschwindet rasch wieder, als Calligos seinem Diener mit einer ruhigen und gebieterischen Geste bedeutet, sich zu beruhigen.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The brute next to Winterscale narrows his bloodshot eyes, his mouth stretching into a gap-toothed grin that is brimming with eagerness. But the grin fades as soon as Calligos, casually and imperiously, gestures for his servant to settle down.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Der Koloss neben Winterzunder kneift seine blutunterlaufenen Augen zusammen, und sein Mund öffnet sich zu einem Grinsen voller Zahnlücken und Vorfreude. Aber es verschwindet rasch wieder, als Calligos seinem Diener mit einer ruhigen und gebieterischen Geste bedeutet, sich zu beruhigen.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Winterscale'in yanındaki vahşi, kanlı gözlerini kısıp ağzı hevesle dolup taşan, eksik dişli bir sırıtışla geriliyor. Sonrasında Calligos, hizmetkârına sakinleşmesini kayıtsızca ve buyurganca işaret eder etmez sırıtışı kayboluyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The brute next to Winterscale narrows his bloodshot eyes, his mouth stretching into a gap-toothed grin that is brimming with eagerness. But the grin fades as soon as Calligos, casually and imperiously, gestures for his servant to settle down.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Winterscale'in yanındaki vahşi, kanlı gözlerini kısıyor ve ağzı hevesle dolup taşan eksik dişli bir sırıtışla geriliyor ama Calligos, hizmetkârına kayıtsızca ve buyurganca sakinleşmesi için işaret eder etmez sırıtışı kayboluyor.{/n}
